More details about our upcoming exhibition

Here is the list of exhibitors making an appearance at our 2009 exhibition.

Layouts

  • Mystic and Oblivion
    USA ‘N’ scale
  • Ashford and Littlemore
    UK ‘OO’ scale
  • Becky’s U Drive
  • Twisty
    ‘N’ scale
  • Willow Bend
    USA ‘HO’ scale
  • Ashwood
    Victorian ‘HO’ scale, early 1970s
  • Murranbilla
    Victorian ‘HO’ scale
  • The Way it Was
    UK H/D 3 rail
  • Totternhoe
    UK narrow gauge ‘O9′ scale
  • Meutabel
    European ‘N’ scale
  • Circus comes to Town
    USA ‘O’ scale

Demonstrations

  • Model Making
    Brian Smith returns with his demonstration of detailed all aspects of model building.
  • Art of the Diorama
    Creating the perfect diorama.
  • WMRC club info stand
    For all enquiries about our club.

Trade stands

  • ARHS
  • Train World
  • Branchline
  • Blue & Gold Models
  • TrainOrama
  • Diane’s “Tinkering Tools”
  • Australian Aviation and Railway Photography
  • WMRC sell stand
